english_example_sentence: You can produce quality products in this modern factory.
russian_example_sentence: Вы можете производить качественную продукцию на этой современной фабрике.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, bu modern fabrikada kaliteli ürünler üretebilirsiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, bu modern fabrikada kaliteli ürünler ______.
